text: The Westing Game is a mystery novel written by Ellen Raskin. It was published in 1978 and it won the Newbery Medal in 1979. It was made into a movie which was released in 1997. This movie was released under both the names The Westing Game and Get a Clue. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1978 books Category:Crime fiction books Category:American young adult novels Category:Newbery Medal winning books
title: The Westing Game
